Module com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1
Package com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall

Class WallHandler

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall.WallHandler
public class WallHandler extends Object
Creates new Wall instances and groups them together. Understands the context of multiple walls together, and moves from one wall to the next. This class stands as an mediator between the GameModel class and the Wall class.
